# NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment.baselineAlignment

**Case**

Aligns adjacent blocks at the baseline of the first line of text in the block.

## Declaration

```swift
case baselineAlignment
```

## Constants

- **NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment.topAlignment**: Aligns adjacent blocks at their top.
- **NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment.middleAlignment**: Aligns adjacent blocks at their middle.
- **NSTextBlock.VerticalAlignment.bottomAlignment**: Aligns adjacent blocks at their bottom.
